content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill(position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Burner mining drill(position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
- Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
- Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill(position x=43.0, y=-84.0) 
- Assembling machine is not found
- Inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5) that puts into a chest
- Inserter at position(x=0.5, y=3.5) that puts into a chest
- Belt group is not found

### Lab
Consists of lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
- Make sure the fluid system is properly set up before connecting entities.

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process.
- Make sure the furnace is properly fueled before starting the smelting process.

### Errors when using inserters
- Ensure inserters have source items to pick up before attempting to use them.
- Make sure the inserter is properly fueled before attempting to use it.

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure boilers are properly connected to a fluid system before attempting to use them.
- Make sure the boiler is properly fueled before attempting to use it.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure offshore pumps are properly connected to a fluid system before attempting to use them.
- Make sure the offshore pump has a proper output before attempting to use it.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure steam engines are properly connected to a fluid system before attempting to use them.
- Make sure the steam engine has a proper input before attempting to use it.
